comments:
Eclipse SDK 20031104

Steps to reproduce:
Check out org.eclipse.help.webapp from repository.
Comment out "custom=true" in build.xml.
Select plugin.xml and choose PDE Tools -> Create Ant Build File.

Notice the build.properties has a line
  source.WEB-INF/lib/jsp.jar=${temp.folder}/jsp.jar.src/
since the third JAR will hold precompiled JSPs.
We use PDE to generate a script every time there is a change in classpaths of 
dependent projects or changes in includes, than we manually add a task to 
generate .java files into ${temp.folder}/jsp.jar.src/ from JSP files.
This used to work in the past.  At some point it was necessary to temporarily 
create a source folder temp.folder/jsp.jar.src/ for PDE to generate build.xml, 
but it worked.  

Now resulting is an error dialog, incomplete build.xml and following exception 
in the log.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.pde.ui 4 0 Nov 04, 2003 19:24:59.98
